info.name: eBay: separate search results from related items
info.description: Add blank space between actual search results and “related items” so you don’t confuse them for each other.
info.additionalInfo: Without this style, if you search for something and there are 0 results, it looks like the “related items” are your actual search results. The blank space added by my style makes it clear at a glance that your search returned no results.
